cards.title: Birthday Boy
cards.gameplay: {BirthdayBoy} may never own more than 40 cards.
powers: {BirthdayBoy} may move any hero ongoing, hero equipment, or hero target with max 5 HP or fewer in play to your play area. Any card moved this way now belongs to {BirthdayBoy} (when it is destroyed, shuffle into the deck of {BirthdayBoy}). Any card moved this way gains the keyword “Present”.
incapacitatedAbilities: Select a hero. Use the first listed incapicitated ability on that character card.
Select a hero. Use the second listed incapicitated ability on that character card.
Select a hero. Use the third listed incapicitated ability on that character card.

openingLines.default: I'll have my cake and beat you too!

cards.title: Blowout
body: Select a target with a max hp of 5 or fewer that was not in play at the start of the game. Remove that target from the game.
Remove this card and one Present in play from the game.

cards.title: Gift Certificate
powers: {BirthdayBoy} may move any hero ongoing, hero equipment, or hero target with max 5 HP or fewer in another player's hand to your hand. Any card moved this way now belongs to {BirthdayBoy} (when it is destroyed, shuffle into the deck of {BirthdayBoy}). Any card moved this way gains the keyword “Present”.

cards.title: Trash the Venue
body: Destroy up to 2 environment cards. For each card destroyed this way, move 1 hero ongoing, hero equipment, or hero target with max 5 HP or fewer belonging to another hero in play to your hand.

cards.title: Gift Receipt
body: Return 1 Present to the trash of its original owner. Gain 4 HP.

cards.title: Gift Registry
body: When this card enters play, each other player may select an ongoing, equipment, or target with max 5 HP from their deck. Put the selected cards under this card. Each card now belongs to {BirthdayBoy} and gains the Present keyword.
At the end of your turn,  put a card from beneath this one into play.
When there are no cards beneath this one, destroy this card.

cards.title: It’s The Thought That Counts
body: Return any number of present cards in play to the play area of its original owner. You may move one card from your trash to your hand for each present returned this way.

cards.title: Party 'Til Dawn
body: You may use an additional power this turn.
{BirthdayBoy} deals up to X+1 targets 1 psychic damage each, where X is the number of presents in his play area.

cards.title: You're Invited!
body: Each other hero may play an ongoing card, equipment card, or target with max hp less than or equal to 5.

cards.title: Social Ladder
body: Any other hero with presents in play from their deck draws X cards, where X is equal to the number of their presents in play.
Any other hero with no presents in play deals themselves 2 psychic damage.

cards.title: Mixer
body: You may destroy any number of presents.
You may use {BirthdayBoy}'s innate power X+1 times this turn, where X is the number of presents destroyed this way.

cards.title: Another Year Older
body: If {BirthdayBoy} owns 40 cards, you may deal one target 25 irreducible radiant damage. You may draw a card.
Remove this card from the game.
